item.description:
Ron Paul July 11th video about the rally: http://www.youtube.com/watch?&v=TC1X47qMmzE

Register for free tickets here: http://ronpaulintampa.eventbrite.com/

Speakers and exact details for this event are still coming together, the campaign needs folks to RSVP so they can get a fairly accurate head count. The event starts at 12 noon and ends at 6pm - doors will open at 11am. The University of South Florida Sun Dome seats 10,411 so this event will be similar in size to the 2008 Rally for the Republic.

Transportation:

Thursday August 23rd there are Ronvoy's bound for Paulfest leaving NYC and CT - the prices are $260 and $275 respectively. Details are here: http://paulfestival.org/travellodging/state-ronvoy-s-to-paul-festival

From RonPaul2012.com:

LAKE JACKSON, Texas – 2012 Republican Presidential candidate Ron Paul will hold a major rally with thousands of supporters ahead of the Republican National Convention in Tampa.

The event will take place at noon on Sunday, August 26th at the University of South Florida’s 11,000-seat Sun Dome.  Yesterday the Ron Paul campaign signed a contract to secure the venue with the approval of the Republican National Committee.

Details of the event are as follows.  Time is Eastern.

Sunday, August 26, 2012

12:00 p.m.
Ron Paul Major Rally
Sun Dome
University of South Florida
4202 E. Fowler Avenue
Tampa, FL 33620

A map of and directions to the Sun Dome can be found by clicking here.
item.name: Ron Paul Tampa Rally
